prompts: Create a playful Normal-type Pokemon that loves to hide in tall grass.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a small, furry creature with stripes and a curious nature.
Generate a charming Pokemon that can curl up like a ball and has a sleek, elongated body.
Make a Pokemon with a light cream-colored belly and brown stripes, perfect for forest exploration.
Imagine a cute, agile creature that scurries quickly and enjoys playing in the grass.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a friendly and energetic companion.
Show me a Pokemon with a long, flexible tail that can help it balance while it runs.

semantic_attributes.combat_style: Fast and agile, often using quick attacks and evasive maneuvers.
